text: Sano jwatasame petala lya Allah tapate pa chilambo malo gakusamila gamajinji ni kusimana chenene, sano jwataŵigule pa nyumba jakwe kusama wa kwa Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ, kaneka chiwa ni kunsimana (petala), basi pamasile pagapatikene malipilo gakwe kwa Allah, ni aŵele Allah Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
